summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges for a package sent on December 17, 2002. It includes information about the sender, recipient, and payment details, as well as instructions for adjustments and inquiries related to the invoice.

persons.name: Jeffrey Schantz
persons.context: Jeffrey Schantz is listed as the sender of a package shipped via FedEx.

persons.name: Dan Jaffe
persons.context: Dan Jaffe is mentioned as the recipient of the package sent via FedEx.

connections.description: Jeffrey Schantz sent a package to Dan Jaffe via FedEx.

events.title: Package Shipment
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-534-45348, dated January 3, 2003.
The total charges for the shipment were USD 8.58.
The package was picked up on December 17, 2002, and delivered on December 18, 2002.
The sender's address is listed as NYSG LLC, 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY.
The recipient's address is listed as Vorys Sater Seymour and Pease, 52 East Gay Street, Columbus, OH.
